verbs.description: red sox defeat dodgers to [V: take] [ARG1: world series title] the boston red sox won their fourth world series championship in 15 years beating the los angeles dodgers 5 - 1 in game 5 sunday night behind david price pitching and steve pearce power alex cora became the first manager from puerto rico to guide a team to the title dodgers los angeles dodgers sox world series
